en.blob: Confidence intervals estimate a parameter by specifying a range of possible values. Such an interval is associated with a confidence level, which is the probability that the procedure used to generate the interval will produce an interval containing the true parameter.
en.chooseDist: Choose a probability distribution to sample from:
